note:
I'm a REALTOR® at Coldwell Banker Hartung and Noblin helping buyers and sellers in the Tallahassee area with all of their real estate needs.

I bring all the latest marketing tools to the table in listing homes including fully immersive virtual reality tours, 3D photos, videos across multiple platforms, local and social marketing using targeted ads for the buyers for each specific home (yeah, we use big data to find that buyer, faster.)
